## Carry Recipe
_Back Wrap Cross Carry with Ruck Straps – Base Size Minus 1 – Torso Pass + 2 Cross Passes_

- Torso Pass over baby on back
- Shoulder Flip and across baby for a Cross Pass
- Repeat with other tail
- Tie in front or Tie Tibetan
